br.eti.rslemos.bitsmagic.arithmetic

Interface ArithmeticCodec


  • public interface ArithmeticCodec
    An implementation of arithmetic coding.

    Arithmetic coding (or range coding) is a form of entropy encoding.

    The subinterfaces of this interface provide access to the ArithmeticCodec.Encoder and ArithmeticCodec.Decoder aspects of the algorithm.

    Encoding usage as follows: 

       ArithmeticCodec.Encoder encoder = ...;
   encoder.write(symbol, cumulativeFrequencies);
   ...
   encoder.flush();

    Decoding usage as follows: 

       ArithmeticCodec.Decoder decoder = ...;
   int symbol = read(cumulativeFrequencies);
   ...
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo Lemos
    See Also:
    Arithmetic coding

      Decoding interface of an ArithmeticCodec.
      static interface  ArithmeticCodec.Encoder
      Encoding interface of an ArithmeticCodec.
